ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t see what could be upsetting about the posts in that thread, but I work as a consultant... as bad as working in a jail in some ways. I think for the
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't see what could be upsetting about the posts
in that thread, but I work as a consultant... as bad
as working in a jail in some ways.

I think for the most part folks should take a chill
pill and learn to appreciate differences of opinion
(diversity). If one can't handle that, then leaving
the forum is an OK option too.

Quwi Changkane, 61 Grandmaster Fenin Ro

--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> Hey, some people have different needs, and are more
> sensative. I hope
> TC can find someplace which meets those needs, and
> does it well.
>
> As it is, I find this group generally quite fine.
> Then again, I have
> worked in a jail for the past thirteen years. My
> skin is a bit thick
> As is my head, obviously, if I haven't found a
> better way to earn a
> living than working in a jail.
>
> Days off are good, though. Lots of gaming time.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Matthew Bond"
> <mattgbond@n...>
> wrote:
> > Thunder Cat wrote:
> > > I am posting to tell Su that this is AGAIN my
> last post. I left
> this
> > > group once before because of idiotic members who
> insisted on
> forcing
> > > their opinions apon others, and I will not put
> up with it. I have
> > > better things to do with my time then spend it
> with opinionated
> low
> > > lifes. Su, I'm sorry for everything, none of
> this goes to you, I
> know
> > > you tired, but there are just too many morons to
> filter out of the
> > > group. To the rest of you, you will never get
> anywhere in life
> with
> > > the attitudes you have. Only in a fantasy game
> like EverQuest will
> > > you ever be something. But at some point you
> need to grow up and
> face
> > > reality, and it's not going to be fun or easy
> when you do. Do not
> > > bother replying to this post. Leave your fights
> and comments out
> of
> > > Su's group and for once in your life respect her
> wishes and be
> > > CONSIDERATE. If you forgot what that word means,
> get a
> dictionary. If
> > > you MUST comment, e-mail me personally, but I
> most likely will
> just
> > > delete the message. Like I said, I have better
> things to do. Good
> > > day.
> > >
> > > -= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-
> >
> > Does this guy read the same posts I do?
> >
> > <shrug>
> >
> > Bye, I guess.
> >
> > Matt
> >
> > Honig Wayfarer
> > 57 Ranger
> > Cazic Thule
>
>
